title: Please let us know who is voting for/against surrender
body: You already know who called the vote, it is unfair to not let everyone know the rest of the votes. Rito, pls, we need to know who on our team is trying to give up and who is trying to keep the hope alive!

replies.body:
That is a horrible idea because it would let flamers target victims even more easily.  I don't even know why they made it so everyone can see who started the surrender vote.

If the surrender didn't go through, why should it even matter who voted in favor of it?  All it would do is enable people to be assholes, and everyone knows the LoL community is filled with assholes.

It would also help out for reports since many players who refuse to Surrender games are obvious trolls.

No one cares about 'LCS can turn 12/35 matches' when we're Silver 5. We're in Hell and we all suck and the longer it goes on the more bad mouthing I get to endure.

> [{quoted}](name=CharQueen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9sKW1gK3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-01T20:31:34.436+0000)
>
> It would also help out for reports since many players who refuse to Surrender games are obvious trolls.
> 
> No one cares about 'LCS can turn 12/35 matches' when we're Silver 5. We're in Hell and we all suck and the longer it goes on the more bad mouthing I get to endure.

That is completely false as countless games I voted no to surrender while we were behind by like 6 towers and in 20 minutes we turned game around and won. I don't like surrendering unless the game is like 63/2.

You can come back sometimes *if* the team actually tries to win and doesn't spend the extra few minutes arguing and trolling.  If you are playing with random people, they're generally arguing instead(and those cases knowing who said what wouln't change anything since they're trolling it out anyway). You just have to sit there and endure the arguing until the enemy finishes you off since Riot deemed any 2 denyers more worthy of existing than any 3 who want surrender.
Yawn. That doesn't happen often enough. Especially in Silver 5.
Yeah this is never gonna happen.
